OUR PRODUCTS

Diabetes

Diabetes is commonly referred as Blood Sugar which is a Metabolic Disorder. Regularly monitoring your Blood Sugar at home with a High Quality Glucometer like GlucesureStar makes it easy to manage your blood sugar and continue to live Healthy Life

For more Details on GlucosureStar

What is Haemoglobin

Haemoglobin is a Protein that is responsible for Transfer of Oxygen in our Blood through our Body. Haemoglobin is formed by two words: "Haem" implies the red color "Globin" implies globular protein. The word "hb" is short form of heamoglobin. The hb level tell you about Quality of your Blood.

For More Details on Hb Meter

Uric Acid

Uric acid is a waste product produced during the process of digestion and is filtered out by our kidneys to maintain healthy conditions in our Body. Due to our bodies sometime producing more Uric Acid and flushing less of it, it deposits in our body causing many type of pains and problems.

For More Details on Uric acid
